doc.title: A Place Like This
doc.plot: A PLACE LIKE THIS is an Award Winning one-hour documentary that provides an intimate portrait of four diverse women living in the Catholic run Jeanne d' Arc Residence in New York City. Each of the film's characters are vibrant, open and articulate women who share their inspiring life stories, struggles and triumphs. The film leaves us with a greater understanding of the values and risks of these women-only communities, the challenges women face in finding economic sustainability and the journeys taken to pursue one's dream
